name: Gregory STOVER, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Stover v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Gregory STOVER, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of April, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief and the Application for an Immediate Hearing is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
41 A.3d 1286
Gregory STOVER, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent.
No. 193 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 20, 2012.
